# Edge cases - these may intentionally produce errors or odd trees
# Unclosed variable start
{{unclosed
# Lone closing braces
}}}}
# Nested like pattern (should treat inner as text/individual chars)
{{outer {{inner}} still in outer}}
# Escaped sequence that almost looks like variable
\{{notAVariable}}
# Backslash at end of variable body
{{endsWithEscape\\}}
# Many braces
{{a{b}c{d}e}}
# Empty then text
{{}}text
